Miecz Samuraja
Samurai Sword
Samurajský meč
Бэнг! Меч Самурая
斬‐サムライソード
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Samurai Sword is a game based on the proven Bang! mechanisms and set in feudal Japan. In this game, the familiar features of Bang! are enhanced by more dynamic and fast-paced game play, and thanks to a new scoring system _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; based on honor points and resilience points _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; there is no player elimination. Everybody gets to fight to the very end! Also, weapons and attacks are fused into a single card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: MeepleCore Podcast Episode 22 - Game Informers Top 2016 board games, Final Fantasy 15 Review, funniest ways to select start player, and more!
